summary: This is my first armor mod. Its Standalone and has its own weight slider. It was inspired by the MMORPG \"Sword of the New World\". Completely made from scratch it features a scripted function that allows the user to equip additional pieces of armor at will using a voice spell for exactly 2 minutes. craftable under ebony category.
descriptionHtml:
CHANGE LOG

---------------- v1 Release
2/18/2013 - Optional Retextures
2/20/2013 - Added environmental mapping
2/23/2013 - Added Espada Amulet
2/27/2013 - Added the Red Corsette Texture Fix
3/2/2013 - v1.1 Fixed a clipping issue when a 2-Handed weapon is equipped and sheathed
____________________________________
____________________________________
UPDATE

     - Added new optional retextures to the sleeves, top shirt, pants, inside back armor and corsette. To install just download with manager or replace files in the appropriate folders. Please choose one of each type (pants, top, sleeves, inside back armor and corsette) I\'m still trying to learn how to do good textures. If any of you want to provide your own textures please feel free to message me and I\'ll give you permission to work on your own retextures.

    - Added Environmental Mapping (Reflection) to custom parts of the armor mesh.

    - Added an Amulet that doesn\'t overlap the 2nd Form neckplate.
____________________________________
____________________________________
FUTURE PLANS

     - MORE RETEXTURES!! =D hopefully they will get better as time progresses.
     - The scripts for \"requipping\" the 2nd form of the armor only apply to the player right now. In the future i might implement a trigger to apply it to your companions. ^^
     - An optional cape when using the requipping function.
     - Fit the Espada Gladiator armor into more Body type mods. (Right now I\'m working on UNP Blessed Body Import... I\'m having trouble making the mesh appear ingame. It shows up in CK but it\'s invisible ingame. Please feel free to PM me some solutions.)
     - Optional visual aura effects while having the 2nd form heavy armor active.
     - Visual effects and sound effects on the transitioning of the 1st Form (light Version) to the 2nd Form (heavy Version) to make it more appealing [When I have time I will research how to do this]
     - Making a home mod to introduce all the elements in this armor mod without the use of console commands. I\'ll work on this during my free time, but I cant promise that it will be released anytime soon.... I\'m kind of busy atm.
____________________________________
____________________________________
DESCRIPTION

	This is my first armor mod. Its Standalone and has its own weight slider. It was inspired by the MMORPG \"Sword of the New World\". Completely made from scratch it features a scripted function that allows the user to equip additional pieces of armor at will using a voice spell for exactly 2 minutes. The original suit (1st Form) is craftable
at the forge under the \"Ebony\" category, but you can just bring up the tilde key (~) and type the following into the console command:
		
		- player.additem 5A000D63 1	(For the Espada Gladiator Suit 1st Form)
		- player.additem 5A001D8C 1	(For the Espada Gladiator Gloves 1st Form)
		- player.additem 5A001D8C 1 	(For the Espada Gladiator Boots 1st Form)
                - player.additem 5B000D62 1  (For the Espada Amulet)
		
	For the spell *I haven\'t added a way to implement the spell tome into the game.. will do so in the future.*
		
		- player.addspell 5A00331D (For the Requip Espada Armor spell - needed to be able to equip the 2nd form)
____________________________________
____________________________________
REQUIREMENTS

	- Caliente Female Body Mod CBBE v3-2 found here @ http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
____________________________________
____________________________________
INSTALLATION

	- Nexus Mod Manager (NMM): Download and have NMM install it for you. If you don\'t have NMM, you can install it here @
	 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager
	- Manual Installation: 
			
			Go to \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\" and place the following files into their folders
	
		1. 000EspadaGladiatorArmor (Mesh folder containing .nif files)
			-----> Data -----> Meshes -----> Armor [This is the destination folder]
		2. 000EspadaGladiator (Texture folder containing .dds files)
			-----> Data -----> textures -----> armor [This is the destination folder]
		3. EspadaGladiatorRemoveScript.pex
			-----> Data -----> Scripts [This is the destination folder]
		4. EspadaGladiatorRequipSpellScriptNSK.pex
			-----> Data -----> Scripts [This is the destination folder]
		5. Espada Gladiator Armor.esp
			-----> Data [This is the destination folder]
	
	- Make sure the esp file is active in the skyrim launcher under Data Files.
____________________________________
____________________________________
UNINSTALLING

	1. Unequip all Espada Gladiator armors and remove them from your inventory.
	2. Make sure the Espada Gladiator armor magic effect is not active. If it is, then wait until the timer runs out.
	3. Travel into a safe location, such as a vanilla exterior in Skyrim. Wait in-game about 3-4 days. Save your game. Quit Skyrim.
	4. Go to \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim\" and remove the following files:
		
		000EspadaGladiatorArmor (Mesh folder containing .nif files)
		000EspadaGladiator (Texture folder containing .dds files)
		EspadaGladiatorRemoveScript.pex
		EspadaGladiatorRequipSpellScriptNSK.pex
		Espada Gladiator Armor.esp
____________________________________
____________________________________
COMPATIBILITY

	Nothing gamebreaking i think.... but the scripted version (2nd Form) uses the Slot Masks 46 and 49. I\'m not sure what will happen if you use a mod that 
uses those 2 Slot Masks. Also, I only made the weight slider with the standard CBBE v3-2 weight sliders in mind so if you use any mods that causes the
weight slider to go past that then possible clipping may occur.
____________________________________
____________________________________
F.A.Q.s

Notes and known issues:
	If you summon the 2nd form and then summon it again a second time, the chest piece that normally fills in the Slot Masks 46 and 49 will disappear.
If this happens, just wait until the Magic Effect timer runs out and then use it again.

Does this mod require SKSE like in the last version you posted on Nexus?
     No. =D Thankfully I was able to adjust the scripts to not need SKSE.^^

How do I craft this armor?
	Just go to any forge and craft it under the \"Ebony\" Category.

How do I get the heavy armor version shown on the photographs?
	You can\'t craft it. You must use the spell Requip Espada Armor to summon it on your character.
	
How do I get the spell to summon the heavy armor version?
	I haven\'t implemented a way to learn the spell. I have plans to put it in a future mod in an effort to make it lore friendly. For now just use
the console command to player.addspell the \"Requip Espada Armor\" spell.

How do I use the spell?
	It\'s a Lesser Power that can be equipped on the voice slot. Equip it and press Z to activate it.
	
Is there a male version?
	I want to make a male version, but I don\'t have the time right now so its possible that I will make it in the future.
____________________________________
____________________________________
PERMISSIONS

	You are not allowed to upload this file to other sites under any circumstances. You must get permission from me before you are allowed to 
modify my files to improve it (I am open to new textures so don\'t be afraid to ask!). You must get permission from me before you are allowed 
to use any of the assets in this file. 
	
CREDITS AND THANKS

	Caliente for the sexy body mesh =D
	Nightasy for the extremely helpful Armor Making Tutorials
author: KarateNars
